comments.html: Funny - that book (The Back of the Napkin) is sitting on my desk to be read, right after I finish the latest Dan Brown novel. Thanks for the motivation!
comments.name: Jeff

comments.html: I'd love to read both (as well as his third book "blah blah blah"), but like everyone else, time is finite and of limited quantity these days. If you were to recommend one, which would it be? I'm most interested in how to create effective drawings versus needing to be sold on why drawings are effective. Any thoughts would be appreciated in this context. Thank you.
comments.name: Unknown
